CustomField.description: This field controls whether or not Dealmaker Triggers will create a 'shadow' Dealmaker Opportunity during the execution on an Opportunity Insert. If checked the Dealmaker triggers will automatically create a shadow opportunity when the opportunity is created
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field controls whether or not Dealmaker Triggers will create a 'shadow' Dealmaker Opportunity during the execution on an Opportunity Insert. If checked the Dealmaker triggers will automatically create a shadow opportunity when the opportunity is crea
CustomField.label: Auto enable Dealmaker for new Opps
